front.title: Private Enterprise Number (PEN) practices and Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registration considerations

abstract.t: Private Enterprise Numbers (PENs), are assigned as part of the technical protocol parameters and are frequently used in the management of network connected equipment or software via SNMP-based network management systems, LDAP, DIAMETER or GSS-API. This document discusses what a Private Enterprise Number (PEN) is, common uses and registration procedures for IANA Considerations. The registration procedures include instructions and requirement for obtaining a new Private Enterprise Number, modification to existing numbers and removal of existing numbers.
